title: Eiffel Tower
description: The iconic iron lattice tower located on the Champ de Mars in Paris. Built in 1889 for the World's Fair.

title: Statue of Liberty
description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture on Liberty Island in New York Harbor. A gift from France dedicated in 1886.

title: Sydney Opera House
